name: @phanect/misc
description: Monorepo for @phanect's personal configs, templates, and other miscellaneous modules for development
author: Jumpei Ogawa (https://phanective.org)

scripts.lint: npm run build && tsc --noEmit && eslint && npm run lint --workspaces
scripts.fix: npm run build && eslint --fix && npm run fix --workspaces --if-present
scripts.release: npm run release:readme && npm run build && npm publish --access public --non-interactive --dry-run --workspace ./modules/
